data.title: stncncem
data.text:
STONE'S CORNER CEMETERY

Jay, Maine

This graveyard is located in East Jay on Rt. 133 between Jay

and Livermore Falls, Me. by the Wiles Funeral Home.

Some of the stones a badly broken and sunk into the ground.

Some have fallen over.

Information in ( ) with -ed are added by us, the editors

(flag) denotes a military affiliation

This record is set up alphabetically by Surname,

not by row or lot as the stones appear in the cemetery.

Copied Apr. 29, 1998

by

E. Nora Farrington & Phyllis E. Hardy
